title: Donald Trump's youngest daughter Tiffany is pregnant, former president says
description: Tiffany Trump, daughter of Donald Trump and Marla Maples, is expecting her first child with husband Michael Boulos. Raised in California, she graduated from Georgetown Law. Known for her low profile, Tiffany supported her father during his presidency and in legal matters. Michael, born in Lebanon, aids Trump’s reelection efforts, engaging with Arab and Muslim American leaders.
author: TOI World Desk
excerpt: Tiffany Trump, daughter of Donald Trump and Marla Maples, is expecting her first child with husband Michael Boulos. Raised in California, she graduate
text: Tiffany Trump and Donald Trump (Picture Credit: X)Tiffany Trump, former President Donald Trump’s youngest and only child with ex-wife Marla Maples, is expecting her first child with her husband Michael Boulos.Tiffany was raised primarily by her mother in California and graduated from Georgetown Law School in 2020. She has always maintained a relatively low profile during her father’s presidency as compared to her half-siblings."She’s going to have a baby, so that’s nice," Trump said at the Detroit Economic Club in Michigan, before the audience that included his son-in-law’s father, Massad Boulos.Trump defined his daughter as a “very exceptional young woman” and her husband, Michael Boulos, as a “very exceptional young guy.”Michael Boulos and Tiffany Trump got married at Mar-a-Lago in November 2022.She has been a supportive figure for her father, appearing at a Manhattan court alongside her husband earlier this year during the former president’s hush money trial.Tiffany stepped into the political spotlight in 2016 and 2020, speaking on Trump’s behalf at the Republican National Convention. She attended the 2023 RNC in Milwaukee but did not speak.Michael Boulos was born in Lebanon and has been actively involved in Trump's reelection efforts. In May, he joined a meeting with Arab and Muslim American leaders alongside Richard Grenell, Trump’s former ambassador to Germany.The gathering aimed to win support from those dissatisfied with President Joe Biden's policies, particularly regarding US backing of Israel in the ongoing conflict with Hamas.
html:
Tiffany Trump and Donald Trump (Picture Credit: X)

Tiffany Trump, former President Donald Trump’s youngest and only child with ex-wife Marla Maples, is expecting her first child with her husband Michael Boulos.
Tiffany was raised primarily by her mother in California and graduated from Georgetown Law School in 2020. She has always maintained a relatively low profile during her father’s presidency as compared to her half-siblings.
"She’s going to have a baby, so that’s nice," Trump said at the Detroit Economic Club in Michigan, before the audience that included his son-in-law’s father, Massad Boulos.

Trump defined his daughter as a “very exceptional young woman” and her husband, Michael Boulos, as a “very exceptional young guy.”

Michael Boulos and Tiffany Trump got married at Mar-a-Lago in November 2022.
She has been a supportive figure for her father, appearing at a Manhattan court alongside her husband earlier this year during the former president’s hush money trial.
Tiffany stepped into the political spotlight in 2016 and 2020, speaking on Trump’s behalf at the Republican National Convention. She attended the 2023 RNC in Milwaukee but did not speak.
Michael Boulos was born in Lebanon and has been actively involved in Trump's reelection efforts. In May, he joined a meeting with Arab and Muslim American leaders alongside Richard Grenell, Trump’s former ambassador to Germany.
The gathering aimed to win support from those dissatisfied with President Joe Biden's policies, particularly regarding US backing of Israel in the ongoing conflict with Hamas.
